cause.description:
Using both classic and contemporary tools of persuasion, Toward Tradition promotes these positive traditional values while opposing the negative forces of “secular fundamentalism” and anti-religion bigotry.
Concerned Jews share this objective with many evangelical and conservative Christians. Working together, they focus on our common cultural, moral, and political goals. The corollary benefit of this alliance is that the majority gentile culture sees that American Jews are not monolithically liberal, and that many of the “progressive” forces in this country are advocating positions that are in fact abhorrent to traditional Judaism.
1. Support for Israel by Strengthening America and Jewish/Christian Understanding
2. Cultural & Moral Standards
3. The Divine Origin of Humans & the Sanctity of Human Life
4. Importance of the Traditional Two-Parent (male & female) Family
5. Compatibility of Religion & Science
6. Environmental Stewardship Consistent with Free Markets and Property Rights
cause.mission: be an educational organization working to advance our nation toward the traditional Judeo-Christian values that defined America’s creation and became the blueprint for her greatness.
cause.name: Toward Tradition
